message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to be closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of a price of $1050000. It's a bit higher than your offer, but I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1050000 and $950000, which would be $1000000. I think that's a fair price for both of us. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1000000 and $1100000, which would be $1050000. I'm not willing to go any lower than that, as it's still below my minimum price. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle and come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1050000. I'm willing to pay $990000, which is as high as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can agree on this price and finalize the sale.
